overview:
Executive Recruiter, High Technology - Green Technology -Solar

Busch International is an executive search firm serving the High Technology & Venture community. Since 1985 we have collaborated with semiconductor, communication, networking and computer systems companies to attract and hire key individuals to lead their expansion.

As an added bonus in todayâ€™s “green” environment Busch International has been conducting successful searches in Energy Generation, Storage, Infrastructure and Efficiency since our first with SunPower 12 years ago.

Our focus is to use our long-term relationships and partnerships to effectively locate and hire executive talent. We are retained to recruit Board member, CEO and VP level management worldwide.
